channel.title: Storage Teleporter
channel.description: I'm trying to set up the Storage Teleporter and I can't seem to get them working. I have the teleporter station (powered), both teleporters have the same name, and the conveyor belts are in the correct positions. In the drop-down at the bottom of the details window, I selected the partner and saved but it hasn't helped. When I reopen the details, it's not paired anymore. What am I missing pls? @Blockout22

item.title: Storage Teleporter
item.dc:creator: @Merix_Style Merix Style
item.description:
@Merix_Style wrote:

Im having the same problem, have you found a fix for it yet or did he contact you at all?

Read full topic

item.title: Storage Teleporter
item.dc:creator: @S_H S H
item.description:
@S_H wrote:

I’m trying to set up the Storage Teleporter and I can’t seem to get them working. I have the teleporter station (powered), both teleporters have the same name, and the conveyor belts are in the correct positions. In the drop-down at the bottom of the details window, I selected the partner and saved but it hasn’t helped. When I reopen the details, it’s not paired anymore. What am I missing pls?
@Blockout22

Read full topic
